column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba was pretty good!  I decided to go with the tapas while my bf got the pork tenderloin.  I ordered the grilled squid
column4: and goat cheese of course.  I liked everything except for the chicken and chorizo
column5: which was a chef's recommendation.  It wasn't anything special
column7: and I've also had better goat cheese.  But the squid and the salmon were excellent!!  I loved the couscous...I can probably eat a whole bowl of it!  The pork tenderloin arrived in a skewer and it was very tender and tasty.  I wish I could have tried their paella
column8: but that would have been too much food.  No worries
